eu.bavenir.vicinity.gatewayapi.restapi.services

Class AdaptersAdidObjects

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
        • eu.bavenir.vicinity.gatewayapi.restapi.services.AdaptersAdidObjects

  • public class AdaptersAdidObjects
extends org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
    This class implements a ServerResource interface for following Gateway API calls: URL: [server]:[port]/api/adapters/{adid}/objects METHODS: GET, POST, PUT SPECIFICATION: @see Gateway API ATTRIBUTES: adid - VICINITY Identifier of the adapter (e.g. 1dae4326-44ae-4b98-bb75-15aa82516cc3).
    Author:
    sulfo

    • Method Detail

      • represent

        @Get
public java.lang.String represent()
        Returns the list of IoT objects registered under adapter.
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of objects registered under specified adapter.

      • accept

        @Post(value="json")
public java.lang.String accept(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        Register the IoT object(s) of the underlying ecosystem e.g. devices, VA service.
        Parameters:
        entity - Representation of the incoming JSON.
        objects - List of IoT object descriptions of the underlying ecosystem (from request).
        Returns:
        All VICINITY identifiers of objects registered under VICINITY Gateway by this call.

      • store

        @Put(value="json")
public void store(org.restlet.representation.Representation entity)
        Update the Adapter description of the adapter.
        Parameters:
        entity - Representation of the incoming JSON.
        description - New description for an already registered adapter (from request).
